item.title: Getting started with cbrtl and FOSS
item.description: So you read up on open source, read up on cbrtl and want to start hacking. There are some preliminaries that you should take care of first. I will list them in order: Create a GitHub account. Set up git on your local computer. If you’re on windows, download GitBash and follow the install instructions. Get a personal test repo set up and try out commands like push, commit, pull etc.
